```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

There are 2 preinstalled proteins already: MERS And Covid. Let's say we just want a comparison score

library("VisualSARSDiff")
pairwiseSpike("COVID-19", "MERS", TRUE)

Hmm... let's say we want a bit more. Let's change the TRUE to a FALSE to see in much more detail!

library("VisualSARSDiff")
pairwiseSpike("COVID-19", "MERS", FALSE)

There we go!
